resources.string: Queen for the past few/dozen decades. She loves her corgis more than you.
You would be as grumpy as him if you did not even get called King.
Grew up thinking he would be king until he realized his mother is immortal.
Will have no hair by the time he is king.
Perfect hair. Taught every little girl that the way to the future king\'s heart is through a fashion show.
Wild youth, but all is forgiven after growing a beard and marrying an American foodie/actress.
